com.jdeals.main.controller

Class JDealsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jdeals.main.controller.JDealsController

  • public class JDealsController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the core of JDeals Manager. It keeps instances dataset of registered users and of the Store itself. It also provides methods to handle the user list ( such as Login, Register, findUser etc.)
    Author:
    Giuseppe Ronca
